Package edu.illinois.geoalarm

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlarmService
    This Service is launched when a trip is planned.
    Contact
    A class used to display team/app contact info, when we haven any.
    CurrMarkerOverlay
    This class override ItemizedOverlay<>, to provide an overlay suitable for displaying the current location of the user.
    DirectionPathOverlay
    This class implements Android Overlay to allow display of travel paths on the map
    GeoAlarm
    The main Activity for the GeoAlarm app When the app is launched, this Activity sets the content view to main, and initializes the primary UI elements.
    GeoAlarmDB
    Used for loading and manipulating the local SQLLite database.
    NearStopOverlay
    An ItemizedOverlay<> for showing nearby stops on the map
    NearStopOverlayItem
    An implementation of OverlayItem, used to show nearby bus stops
    Options
    This Activity is used to set various user options for the GeoAlarm app
    R  
    R.array  
    R.attr  
    R.color  
    R.drawable  
    R.id  
    R.layout  
    R.menu  
    R.string  
    RouteMap
    A MapActivity class that will be responsible for displaying the transit map.
    StopInfo
    A class which encapsulates all of the information about a particular stop
    Timetable
    This Activity displays the bus schedule to the user.
    TripPlanner
    The TripPlanner activity handles planning a bus trip.
